PathOfBuilding.Notes:
At Level 29 the ebony barracks you can raise a new blackguard firemage or you can have a squishy version of the goatman fire-raiser by raising a goatman shaman at act 1 the climb.
at level 38 kaom's stronghold raise the new spectre lavianga's acolyte
At Level 47 act 6 prisoner's gate raise the new spectre goatman fire-raiser
